mapper.select: SELECT id ,plugin_type ,monitor_item ,value_type ,value_unit ,max_value ,min_value ,typical_value ,alarm_threshold ,monitor_mode ,belong_flag ,default_value from dev_hardware_template WHERE plugin_type = #{pluginType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'PWR' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'ADC' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'AI' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = '智能BI' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = '智能BO' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'LCD' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.value_unit ,d1.signal_desc as monitor_item from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'SV/GOOSE' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = 'CPU' ORDER BY d1.signal_id

SELECT d1.id ,d1.device ,d1.board_id ,d1.alarm_flag ,d1.value ,d1.signal_id ,d1.src ,d1.valid ,i1.model ,i1.name ,b1.slot ,b1.plugin_type ,d2.value_type ,d2.monitor_item ,d2.value_unit from dev_online_signal d1 left join info_protect_device i1 on d1.device = i1.id left join dev_hardware_template d2 on d1.signal_id = d2.id left join info_plugin_config b1 on d1.board_id = b1.id WHERE d1.device = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b1.slot = #{slot,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND d2.plugin_type = '机箱' ORDER BY d1.signal_id
